vl-ui-button demo

Meer voorbeelden en documentatie.

Button primary

                
                    <button is="vl-button" id="button-primary" type="button">Gegevens opslaan</button>

Button disabled

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button" id="button-disabled" disabled>Gegevens opslaan</button>

Button error

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button" error>Gegevens opslaan</button>

Button met icon na tekst

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button">Contactpersoon opslaan<span is="vl-icon" icon="location" after></span></button>

Button met icon voor tekst

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button"><span is="vl-icon" icon="location" before></span>Contactpersoon opslaan</button>

Button block

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button" block>Gegevens opslaan</button>

Button large

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button" large>Gegevens opslaan</button>

Button wide

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button" wide>Gegevens opslaan</button>

Button narrow

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button" narrow>Gegevens opslaan</button>

Button loading

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button" loading disabled>Gegevens verwerken</button>

Button secondary

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button" secondary>Gegevens opslaan</button>

Button secondary met icoon voor

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button" secondary><span is="vl-icon" icon="location" before></span>Gegevens opslaan</button>

Button secondary error

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button" secondary><span is="vl-icon" icon="location" before></span>Gegevens opslaan</button>

Button secondary error met icoon voor

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button" secondary error><span is="vl-icon" icon="location" before></span>Gegevens opslaan</button>

Button tertiary

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button" tertiary>Gegevens opslaan</button>

Button tertiary met icoon voor

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button" tertiary><span is="vl-icon" icon="location" before></span>Gegevens opslaan</button>

Button tertiary error

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button" tertiary error>Gegevens verwerken</button>

Button icoon

                
                    <button is="vl-button" type="button"><span is="vl-icon" icon="location"></span><span class="vl-u-hidden"></span></button>

Link button

                
                    <a is="vl-link-button" href="#">Ga naar startpagina</a>
Ga naar startpagina

Pill clickable

                
                  <button is="vl-button-pill" type="button">
                    Optie 1
                  </button>

Pill clickable types

                
                    <button is="vl-button-pill" type="success">Optie 1</button>
                    <button is="vl-button-pill" type="warning">Optie 1</button>
                    <button is="vl-button-pill" type="error">Optie 1</button>

Input addon met icoon

                
                    <button is="vl-button-input-addon" type="button">
                        <span is="vl-icon" icon="location"></span>
                    </button>
